docTitle.titlePart:
Clinical Protocol
Administration of a Replication-Deficient Adeno-Associated
Virus Gene Transfer Vector Expressing the Human CLN2
cDNA to the Brain of Children with Late Infantile Neuronal
Ceroid Lipofuscinosis
